# GroupActivity.Sessions

**Type Alias**

A type that provides asynchronous, sequential, iterated access to the sessions for the activity.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias Sessions = GroupSession<Self>.Sessions
```

## Discussion

A `Sessions` type contains a sequence of [doc://com.apple.GroupActivities/documentation/GroupActivities/GroupSession] objects specific to the current activity. The [doc://com.apple.GroupActivities/documentation/GroupActivities/GroupActivity/sessions()] method returns this type, and you use it to retrieve the current session, if any, for that activity. The system creates only one [doc://com.apple.GroupActivities/documentation/GroupActivities/GroupSession] object for each new activity. To detect changes to the session’s state, activity type, or active participants, subscribe to the corresponding properties.

## Receiving an activity-related session

- **sessions()**: Returns the sessions for this activity as an asynchronous sequence.
